TopicTitle: KSP part tools particle emitter broken?

Articles.Content:
I am working on a part with RCS ports, so I can't use stock RCS effects (they appear to be multiparticle effects, and don't work well with the model in question).  

Unfortunately, KSP PartTools' particle emitter breaks my saved particle effects, and the "set up particle emitter" button does absolutely nothing.  I'm going to see if I can get my effects to work without it, but I doubt KSP will support them. 

Help.
